activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.WidgetConfigureActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: holds all UI components related to widget configuration
centers the widget configuration UI horizontally with margins
includes the actual widget layout for previewing configuration changes
opens a color picker dialog to select the widget's background color
contains the seekbar for adjusting background transparency
modifies the alpha (transparency) value of the widget's background color
opens a color picker dialog to choose the widget's text and icon colors
saves the selected widget configuration and updates the AppWidget
wraps the entire widget UI layout for preview during configuration
displays and applies the selected background color with transparency
contains UI elements for displaying song title and artist information
shows the currently playing song title in the widget
shows the currently playing song artist in the widget
includes playback control buttons like previous, play/pause, and next

activities.summary: This activity, WidgetConfigureActivity, is used for configuring widget appearance settings such as background color, text color, and transparency. It allows users to customize the look of a music player widget dynamically and save these configurations, which are then applied to the corresponding AppWidget instance.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.TrackActivity
activities.summary: TrackActivity is responsible for handling media playback controls, displaying track information, and managing user interactions such as play/pause, seek, shuffle, repeat, and playback speed. It supports third-party intents for playing specific tracks and ensures proper lifecycle management of media playback.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.AlbumsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: acts as the root layout for the activity, coordinating child views like the toolbar, album list, and fast scroller.
holds and organizes the RecyclerView and fast scroller, ensuring proper scrolling behavior and viewport filling.
provides a fast-scrolling interface for navigating through the list of albums efficiently.
shows the list of albums using a custom RecyclerView with animations and layout manager for smooth scrolling and display.
includes a reusable UI component showing the currently playing track at the bottom of the screen.

activities.summary: This activity displays a list of albums associated with an artist. It allows users to navigate to the tracks of a selected album, play a track directly, or request notification permissions for playback. The toolbar is configured for navigation and visual consistency.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The SplashActivity is typically used as the starting screen of the application, which may include initial setup or navigation to other parts of the app.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.TracksActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: hosts all UI elements including the toolbar, RecyclerView for tracks, fast scroller, placeholders, and current track bar
displays title, navigation icon, and menu items like search, sort, and export playlist; dynamically adjusts visibility based on source type
holds the RecyclerView and fast scroller with vertical layout
provides fast scroll functionality for quickly navigating through the list of tracks
shows the list of tracks in a RecyclerView with layout animation for smoother item insertion
displays 'No items found' message when the track list is empty
suggests adding a folder to playlist when no tracks are available
includes a reusable view for displaying and controlling the currently playing track

activities.summary: TracksActivity is used to display and manage a list of music tracks. It supports functionalities such as searching, sorting, exporting playlists, and filtering tracks based on user input. The activity also handles UI components like toolbar setup, fast scrolling, placeholder views when no tracks are found, and includes a current track bar for playback control.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.SettingsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: shows the title as 'Settings' using Material Design styling.
triggers color customization functionality by navigating to a new screen or dialog.
navigates to WidgetConfigureActivity for customizing widget colors.
launches an intent related to purchasing or thanking users if conditions are met.
toggles between English and system default language and restarts the app.
opens an intent to change the app's language based on device locale.
starts ExcludedFoldersActivity to manage folders that should be excluded from music scanning.
displays a dialog for managing which tabs are visible in the app.
swaps the functionality of previous/next buttons on headphones based on user preference.
opens a dialog to configure how song titles are displayed (e.g., use filename if no title is available).
enables or disables gapless playback and updates player command accordingly.

activities.summary: This activity is used for managing application settings, including color customization, language configuration, playback behavior, tab visibility, widget settings, filename display, and excluded folder management.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.ExcludedFoldersActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Holds and coordinates the layout components, providing parent-level organization for UI elements.
Navigates back to the previous screen or closes the current activity.
Wraps the RecyclerView and TextView to provide a scrollable content area with consistent padding and viewport handling.
Displays the list of excluded folders, allowing users to interact with individual folder items (e.g., remove or edit).

static_properties.text: Excluding a folder will prevent the displaying of all audio files within. Files manually added to playlists will not be affected.

dynamic_properties.effect: Provides instructional text when no folders are excluded, explaining the behavior of excluding folders from audio scanning.

activities.summary: This activity is used to manage and display a list of excluded folders in the music player application. It allows users to view and potentially modify which folders are excluded from being scanned for audio files.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.SimpleControllerActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as a central controller for managing media playback operations in the music player application. It provides methods to prepare, play, queue, delete tracks, and manage interactions with the media controller across different Android versions.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.SimpleActivity
activities.summary: A brief summary of the activity's functionality. For example: This activity serves as the main interface for the music player, providing controls for playing, pausing, and navigating through songs.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.EqualizerActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Provides the main layout structure and handles nested scrolling behavior.
Displays the title 'Equalizer' and supports navigation actions like returning to the previous screen.
Allows vertical scrolling of the equalizer settings if they exceed the screen height.
Holds the main UI components related to the equalizer configuration, such as band controls and labels.
Contains text views showing decibel (dB) values (+15, 0, -15) to indicate the equalizer band range.
Acts as a spacing element for alignment in the dB labels row.
Shows the maximum gain level (+15 dB) for reference in the equalizer UI.
Indicates the baseline (0 dB) for the equalizer bands.
Shows the lowest possible gain (-15 dB) for reference in the UI.
Groups SeekBars and labels for each frequency band, allowing user interaction with each band's gain.
Opens a dialog to choose from available equalizer presets and applies the selected one.
Holds the UI components for a single equalizer band, such as the SeekBar and frequency label.
Adjusts the gain level for the corresponding frequency band and updates the equalizer settings.
Shows the frequency range this band affects (e.g., '60 Hz').

activities.summary: The EqualizerActivity allows users to adjust audio equalizer settings, including selecting presets and customizing individual frequency bands. It provides a UI for interacting with an equalizer, saving and applying configurations, and formatting values for display.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.QueueActivity
activities.summary: The QueueActivity manages a queue of music tracks, allowing users to view the current playback queue, search for specific tracks, create playlists from the queue, and dynamically filter the displayed list using a search interface.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.SimpleMusicActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as the main interface for a music player application, managing playback controls and reflecting changes in the media player state to the UI. It handles transitions between media items, updates the track bar view based on playback state, and prepares the UI when the player is ready or the activity is resumed.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.musicplayer.activities.MainActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Holds all UI components with coordinated layout behavior for animations and transitions.
Displays options for sorting, refreshing media, sleep timer, playlist creation, import, equalizer, settings, about, and more apps.
Contains the main scrollable content including progress bar, view pager, tab layout, and track bar.
Holds primary UI elements such as loading progress bar, view pager, and tab layout.
Displayed during media scanning or fragment refresh to indicate ongoing background operations.
Allows switching between different fragments such as Tracks, Playlists, Artists, etc.
Shows current playing track info and playback controls at the bottom of the screen.
Provides tab navigation between available music categories (tracks, playlists, etc.) with custom styling.
Displays and manages the sleep timer UI, allowing users to set or stop a sleep timer for playback.
Top visual separator within the sleep timer UI.
Start-side divider within the sleep timer UI for layout separation.
Displays static 'Sleep Timer' label in the sleep timer UI.
Shows the current countdown time remaining on the active sleep timer.
Stops the currently active sleep timer and hides the associated UI.

layouts.name: R.menu.xx (not explicitly named, but referenced via R.id.menu_items)

activities.summary: MainActivity serves as the main interface of a music player application, providing navigation across different fragments (e.g., tracks, playlists), media playback controls, settings, equalizer, and playlist management. It includes features like sleep timer, importing/exporting playlists, handling app updates, and managing UI states such as tabs and search.
